sentences.en: A young settler on the beach said he understood what drove the militants.
sentences.cn: 沙滩上的一名年轻的定居者称他理解驱使武装分子的行为.

sentences.en: That shot was a settler; It'struck poor Sage right between wind and water.
sentences.cn: 那一枪是致命的, 它恰恰击中了可怜的塞奇的要害部位.

sentences.en: The results showed that the inclined plate settler was better than the gravity settler.
sentences.cn: 结果表明斜板沉降器对含有表面活性剂存在的物系,具有较好的分离特性.

sentences.en: The settler got the house at a nominal price.
sentences.cn: 移居者象征性地花点钱买下了这栋房子.

sentences.en: The settler may be a beneficiary and may also be the only under the same trust.
sentences.cn: 委托人可以是受益人,也可以是同一信托的唯一受益人.

words.tran_cn: 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民

trans.tran_cn: 移民，侨民，殖民者，决定者，定居者
trans.tran_en: someone who goes to live in a country or area where not many people like them have lived before, and that is a long way from any towns or cities
